original_text: And Jacob served seven years for Rachel; and they seemed unto him but a few days, for the love he had to her.
korean_text: 야곱이 라헬을 위하여 칠 년 동안 라반을 섬겼으나 그를 사랑하는 까닭에 칠 년을 며칠 같이 여겼더라

sentences.original_text: And Jacob served seven years for Rachel
sentences.korean_translation: 야곱은 라헬을 위해 일곱 해를 섬겼다

sentences.original_text: and they seemed unto him but a few days
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것은 그에게 며칠밖에 되지 않는 것처럼 보였다

sentences.original_text: for the love he had to her
